sys_remote_update_set.description:
This Update set contains the following:
Page: - Photos - Contact
Widgets: - Footer [updated the html and css to display the footer always at bottom] - Sign Up Form [updated the code to make it look more user friendsly, cosmetic changes and updated the redirection to the log in page] - Menu [updated the redirection on menu options and updated the color of the menu as per theme] - Photos [new created] - Contact [new created]
Business Rule: -User table before Query business rule to display only the Photography Compnay users -Photography user table to created a parallel record in the system user table
sys_remote_update_set.name: Comp - 231 version 3

//this is a before query BR

sys_update_xml.name: sys_script_59b9e8942f445450d5b2d3f62799b63f
sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update sys_domain="global" table="sys_script"><sys_script action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><abort_action>false</abort_action><access>package_private</access><action_delete>false</action_delete><action_insert>true</action_insert><action_query>false</action_query><action_update>false</action_update><active>true</active><add_message>false</add_message><advanced>true</advanced><change_fields>false</change_fields><client_callable>false</client_callable><collection>u_photography_users</collection><condition/><description/><execute_function>false</execute_function><filter_condition/><is_rest>false</is_rest><message/><name>Create New User</name><order>10</order><priority>100</priority><rest_method/><rest_method_text/><rest_service/><rest_service_text/><rest_variables/><role_conditions/><script><![CDATA[(function executeRule(current, previous /*null when async*/) {

	// Add your code here
	//Adding the new user in the system user table
	var gr = new GlideRecord("sys_user");
	gr.initialize();
	gr.user_name = current.u_username;
	gr.first_name = current.u_first_name;
	gr.last_name = current.u_last_name;
	gr.email = current.u_email;
	gr.user_password.setDisplayValue(current.u_password);
	gr.phone = current.u_phone_number;
	gr.company = "bfefa09c2f445450d5b2d3f62799b631"; //Photography Compnay's sys_id
	gr.insert();

})(current, previous);]]></script><sys_class_name>sys_script</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2020-04-04 05:03:49</sys_created_on><sys_domain>global</sys_domain><sys_domain_path>/</sys_domain_path><sys_id>59b9e8942f445450d5b2d3f62799b63f</sys_id><sys_mod_count>3</sys_mod_count><sys_name>Create New User</sys_name><sys_overrides/><sys_package display_value="Global" source="global">global</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="Global">global</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_script_59b9e8942f445450d5b2d3f62799b63f</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2020-04-04 16:17:54</sys_updated_on><template/><when>after</when></sys_script><sys_translated_text action="delete_multiple" query="documentkey=59b9e8942f445450d5b2d3f62799b63f"/></record_update>

sys_update_xml.name: sp_widget_784033b92ff34c10d5b2d3f62799b6c2
sys_update_xml.payload: customc@charset "UTF-8"; table{ width: 100%; } #titlefont { font-family: Georgia, serif; font-size: 40px; letter-spacing: 2px; word-spacing: 2px; color: #000000; font-weight: normal; text-decoration: overline solid rgb(68, 68, 68); font-style: normal; font-variant: small-caps; text-transform: none; } #cssmenu { padding: 5%; margin: 0; border: 0; width: auto; } #cssmenu ul, #cssmenu ul li, #cssmenu ul ul { list-style: none; margin: 0; padding: 0; } #cssmenu ul { position: relative; z-index: 597; float: left; } #cssmenu ul li { float: left; min-height: 1px; line-height: 1em; vertical-align: middle; } #cssmenu ul li.hover, #cssmenu ul li:hover { position: relative; z-index: 599; cursor: default; } #cssmenu ul ul { visibility: hidden; position: absolute; top: 100%; left: 0; z-index: 598; width: 100%; } #cssmenu ul ul li { float: none; } #cssmenu ul ul ul { top: 1px; left: 99%; } #cssmenu ul li:hover > ul { visibility: visible; } #cssmenu ul ul { top: 1px; left: 99%; } #cssmenu ul li { float: none; } #cssmenu ul ul { margin-top: 1px; } #cssmenu ul ul li { font-weight: normal; } /* Custom CSS Styles */ #cssmenu:after, #cssmenu ul:after { content: ''; display: block; clear: both; } #cssmenu > ul > li > a { color: #333333; } #cssmenu ul ul a { color: #333333; } #cssmenu a { display: inline-block; font-family: "Lucida Grande", "Lucida Sans Unicode", Helvetica, Arial, Verdana, sans-serif; font-size: 12px; padding: 0 20px; text-align: center; text-decoration: none; } #cssmenu a:hover { background: #c9d5e1; border-radius: 4px 4px 0 0; -moz-border-radius: 4px 4px 0 0; -webkit-border-radius: 4px 4px 0 0; box-shadow: 0 2px 3px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.1); -moz-box-shadow: 0 2px 3px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.1); -webkit-box-shadow: 0 2px 3px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.1); position: relative; top: 0; } #cssmenu ul { background: #eef3f9; border-radius: 5px 5px 0 0; -moz-border-radius: 5px 5px 0 0; -webkit-border-radius: 5px 5px 0 0; list-style: none; } #cssmenu > ul { background: url(data:image/png;base64,iVBORw0KGgoAAAANSUhEUgAAAAEAAAAoCAIAAACw1AcgAAAAA3NCSVQICAjb4U/gAAAAHUlEQVQImWN4+vQpEwMDAxMDAwPT////4exBIgYA2loa5nAttNYAAAAASUVORK5CYII=) 100% 100%; background: -moz-linear-gradient(top, #eef3f9 0%, #dbeafb 100%); background: -webkit-gradient(linear, left top, left bottom, color-stop(0%, #eef3f9), color-stop(100%, #dbeafb)); background: -webkit-linear-gradient(top, #eef3f9 0%, #dbeafb 100%); background: -o-linear-gradient(top, #eef3f9 0%, #dbeafb 100%); background: -ms-linear-gradient(top, #eef3f9 0%, #dbeafb 100%); background: linear-gradient(#eef3f9 0%, #dbeafb 100%); box-shadow: 0 2px 2px 1px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.3); -moz-box-shadow: 0 2px 2px 1px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.3); -webkit-box-shadow: 0 2px 2px 1px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.3); padding-top: 5px; width: 100%; } #cssmenu > ul > li { float: left; padding: 0 10px; position: relative; } #cssmenu > ul > li:hover > a { background: #c9d5e1; border-radius: 4px 4px 0 0; -moz-border-radius: 4px 4px 0 0; -webkit-border-radius: 4px 4px 0 0; box-shadow: 0 2px 3px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.1); -moz-box-shadow: 0 2px 3px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.1); } #cssmenu .has-sub:hover ul { display: block; } #cssmenu .has-sub a { display: block; position: relative; } #cssmenu .has-sub > a:after { content: ''; display: block; width: 10px; height: 9px; position: absolute; right: 5px; top: 50%; margin-top: -5px; background-image: url(data:image/png;base64,); -webkit-transform: rotate(360deg); } #cssmenu .has-sub ul { background: #c9d5e1; border: 1px solid #dbeafb; border-radius: 5px; -moz-border-radius: 5px; -webkit-border-radius: 5px; display: none; padding: 10px 0; position: absolute; left: 50%; top: 34px; margin-left: -70px; width: 140px; z-index: 1; } #cssmenu .has-sub ul li:hover > a { background: #dbeafb; color: #ae0001; border-color: #eef3f9 transparent transparent transparent; } #cssmenu .has-sub ul a { line-height: 160%; padding: 8px 0; } #cssmenu .has-sub .has-sub a:after { background-image: url(data:image/png;base64,); -webkit-transform: rotate(360deg); } #cssmenu .has-sub .has-sub ul { background: #dbeafb; left: 100%; top: 0; margin-left: 0; } #cssmenu .has-sub .has-sub ul a { background: none; box-shadow: none; -moz-box-shadow: none;
